short_summary: Purchase office furniture for Fisheries and Oceans Canada to Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
description: 1. This tender is issued pursuant to the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA: \\n- Product Category 1 - Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems;\\n- Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products;\\n- Product Category 3 - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets;\\n- Product Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products\\n- Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture;////\\n\n2. Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Dartmouth, Nova Scotia by May 31st, 2023.////\\n\n3. This tender covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).  \\n \\nIf you wish to find out how you can be a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement: Conservation and Protection of MPO Furniture

#### Notice Details
| Key | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3886020957-Doc3899259794 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3886020957 |
| Publication Date | 2023-03-03 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-03-22T14:00:00 (Expired) |

#### Solicitation Details
| Key | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Category | Accommodation Furniture (Accommodation Furniture, Home Furnishings) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Selective Tendering |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |

#### Notice Type
This solicitation is issued in response to a Demand for Proposal (RFP) that is part of a Supply Arrangement.

#### Products Required
This requirement covers the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for Fisheries and Oceans Canada, to be delivered to Dartmouth, Nova Scotia by May 31st, 2023. The products required are:

* Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
* Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Ancillary and Lighting Products
* Support Space - Collaborative Furniture

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to bidders whose companies are qualified under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with the following contact details:

* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Erin Surette, (elle-la / she-her)
* Contact Email: [erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
The notice can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15578277?extsite=MTU1NzgyNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5M
